# 'gs branch up' prompts to pick between multiple branches.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2024-03-30T14:59:32Z'

# main with initial commit
mkdir repo
cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

gs bc head1 -m 'head1'
gs down
gs bc head2 -m 'head2'
gs down
gs bc head3 -m 'head3'
gs down

git log --graph --oneline head1 head2 head3
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/state-git-log.txt

# cannot go up if there are multiple above
# and we're in non-interactive mode
! gs up
stderr 'not allowed to prompt for input'

with-term $WORK/input.txt -- gs up
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/interact.txt

git branch
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/git-branch.txt

-- input.txt --
await Pick a branch

snapshot dialog
feed \x1b[B
await

snapshot select
feed \r

-- golden/interact.txt --
### dialog ###
┃ Pick a branch
┃ > head1
┃   head2
┃   head3
### select ###
┃ Pick a branch
┃   head1
┃ > head2
┃   head3
-- golden/state-git-log.txt --
* 524a964 head1
| * 81559b1 head2
|/  
| * 155e1d0 head3
|/  
* 9bad92b Initial commit
-- golden/git-branch.txt --
  head1
* head2
  head3
  main
